name: Clefairy
author: Sumiyoshi Kizuki
flavor_text: The moonlight that it stores in the wings on its back apparently gives it the ability to float in midair.

attacks.name: Doubleslap
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Squaredance
attacks.effect: Flip a number of coins equal to the total number of Pokémon in play. For each heads, you may search your deck for a basic Energy card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
